Package eu.kartoffelquadrat.tigerencryption.otpgenerator

Class Cryptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.kartoffelquadrat.otpgenerator.Cryptor
  • public class Cryptor
extends Object
    Utils class for conversion of messages. Conversion works both ways since this is a synmmetric encryption algorithm. Internaly it uses the same "cryptChunkSizedMethod" for decryption and enryption of messages.
    Author:
    Maximilian Schiedermeier

        public Cryptor()

    • Method Detail

      • encryptMessage

        public static EncryptedMessage encryptMessage​(byte[] plainMessage,
                                              OneTimePad pad,
                                              int startChunkId)
                                       throws CryptorException
        Decryptor method to cencrypt a plain message by applying a series of chunks.
        Parameters:
        plainMessage - as the byte stream of the message to encrypt.
        pad - as the one time pad to use for encryption
        startChunkId - as the index of the first chunk in the pad to use.
        Returns:
        a new Encrypted message object with the protected material.
        Throws:
        CryptorException - in case the message cannot be converted.

      • decryptMessage

        public static byte[] decryptMessage​(EncryptedMessage encryptedMessage,
                                    OneTimePad pad,
                                    boolean text)
                             throws CryptorException
        Counterpart for the exnrypt message method. Takes an encrypted message object and converts it back to a plain messae in form of single byte[] using the provided onte time pad.
        Parameters:
        encryptedMessage - as the message to decrypt.
        pad - as the pad that contains the key material needed for decryption.
        text - inidcator that the content is text and should be trimmed.
        Returns:
        byte[] representing the decrypted message.
        Throws:
        CryptorException - in case the encrypted message and pad are not compatible.

      • chop

        protected static byte[][] chop​(byte[] plainMessage,
                               int chopSize)
        Cuts a provided byte[] into smaller byte arrays that each have the requested size. The lase chunk is filled up with whitespace bytes, to reach the requested size.
        Parameters:
        plainMessage - byte array of the original message that may or may not fit into a series of chunks.
        chopSize - the target size for byte[] in the return array.
        Returns:
        byte[][] where each element is guaranteed to have exactly the requested size.

      • getWhiteSpaceByteArray

        protected static byte[] getWhiteSpaceByteArray​(int length)
        Herlper method to get a byte array that correcpons a whitespace only message of desired length.
        Parameters:
        length - target length for the whitespace array.
        Returns:
        a whitespace only byte array.

      • cryptChunkSizedMessage

        protected static byte[] cryptChunkSizedMessage​(byte[] message,
                                               byte[] chunk)
                                        throws CryptorException
        Decryptor / Cryptor helper method implementation for a single message that is short enough to go into a single chunk. The encryption algorithm is symmetric, that is to say the same chunk is used for encryption and decryption.
        Parameters:
        message - as byte array of plain or encrypted message to convert.
        chunk - as the chunk to use for encryption / decryption.
        Returns:
        byte array representing the converted message.
        Throws:
        CryptorException - in case the message is longer than the chunk size used.

      • padString

        protected static String padString​(String message,
                                  int targetLength)
                           throws CryptorException
        Helper method to pad a String with trailing whitespaces. Can be used to adjust the length of a plain String message that is shorter than a chunk, prior to calling the cryptor method.
        Parameters:
        message - as the original message,
        targetLength - as expected output message size. Cannot be smaller than message length.
        Returns:
        padded message, with trailing whitespaces.
        Throws:
        CryptorException - if the message is too long.
